title: Bonus 24 The Whacky Book of Daniel
itunes:title: Bonus: The Whacky Book of Daniel
description: This is a bonus episode for season two. Steve Guerra and I tackle the the book of Daniel. We all know the book's stories of Daniel: the lion's den, the fiery furnace, and the writing on the wall. We discover a book of two parts, one of which claims to be a reliable history of Babylonian times. Spoiler: It's not. The second half is the only apocalypse in the Old Testament.
content:encoded: This is a bonus episode for season two. Steve Guerra and I tackle the the book of Daniel. We discover a book of two parts, one of which claims to be a reliable history of Babylonian times. Spoiler: It's not. The second half is the only apocalypse in the Old Testament.
itunes:subtitle: This is a bonus episode for season two. Steve Guerra and I tackle the only apocalypse in the Old Testament, the book of Daniel.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Steven Guerra
